Package entities.course_info

Class Course

java.lang.Object
entities.course_info.Course
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable, java.io.Serializable
public class Course
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, Printable
Course entity to store information regarding a course Details specific to each index in the course are stored in the Index class
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • Course

      public Course​(java.lang.String courseCode, java.lang.String courseName, School school, int acadU) throws OutOfRangeException
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      courseCode - String showing the course code
      courseName - String showing the course name
      school - School that hosts the course
      acadU - Number of academic units carried by the course
      Throws:
      OutOfRangeException - thrown if the academic unit is less than 1

    • deleteIndex

      public Index deleteIndex​(java.lang.String indexNo) throws InvalidInputException
      Method to allow deletion of indexes NOTE: indexes cannot be deleted if students have registered for them
      Parameters:
      indexNo - String with the index number of the index
      Returns:
      the Index that had been deleted
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - thrown if a course with students registered is to be deleted
